cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.summary:
So offers (and recommends) hosting the application in 'The Cloud' (or cloud).
'The Cloud' is a virtual space where we will install and store everything necessary for our applications. it will be enough to have an internet connection to access our applications from anywhere in the world and with any device with an internet connection (mobile, PC, tablet, etc).

front.title: Webs
front.summary:
Web page creations are offered to maximize the reach of our presence on the net, while facilitating access for customers or users.
HTML5 and CSS3 based applications to facilitate viewing on any device and / or platform.

back.title: Business
back.summary: For medium or large applications, it is necessary to have the business logic separate from the web presentation. Solutions are offered with microservices based on the main programming languages ​​and their most powerful frameworks to guarantee efficiency and security.

data.title: Data
data.summary: Database resources of all kinds are offered. From free for small budgets, to large and robust used by large world-class companies.

i3e.description: Development in different projects both in Java, JEE, PHP, .Net Oracle SQLServer, Java Script, Hibernate, Maven, Swing, Apache, IIS, Laravel, etc. Customers as Aigües de Barcelona, ​​Xarxa Oberta, Merak, etc. ... Web services, forms, modules for Sugar CRM, database migration

optimissa1.description: Java developer: Maintenance of web application with J2EE (Hibernate, JSF, EJB, Maven, Spring) and evolutionary of Java application with Swing. Oracle database. Subversion repository

optimissa2.description: Java Analyst: Requirements taking and functional writing. And unit test design and implementation with Junit4

optimissa3.description: Head of Technical Support Department: Management of a team of 6 people to provide incident support to the entity's applications based on J2EE (Maven) and Swing

cerba.description: Team management of 2 programmers for a new own laboratory program based on Angular 5 with Caché and Java Microservices (MVC + JPA) with Maven. Evolutionary of Mirth (Java) for communications and integrations with SQL Server. Maintenance internal applications in .NET. TFS repository

deloitte.description: Team leader and developer in an international project. SCRUM with meeting in English. Angular JS, Angular + and Java Microservices (MVC + JPA) project with connection to Oracle. GIT repository with GITLAB

antares.description: Team leader and developer as Full Stack. Front End with VueJs and Rest Services with .Net Core. Azure Devops for CI / CD. SQL server and SCRUM and Kanban methodologies. GIT repository

dxc.description: FrontEnd team leader and developer with Stenciljs. Creation of own web components for import and use on all the websites of the client's entity. GIT repository
